CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Sale Closed stage positioned above or below the Negotiation stage?
SRP.A: The Sale Closed stage is positioned {below} the Negotiation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Sale Closed?
VE.A: The value of stage Sale Closed is {273}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Viewed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Viewed is {713}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Viewed, with a value of {713}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {228}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed?
SC.A: Decreased by {115} Properties from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {238} Properties from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 594? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 250? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 250 and 417? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Contract Signed} stage has {360}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {273}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to stage {Contract Signed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Property Viewed} and {Negotiation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Sale Closed} and {Post-sale Survey} stages.
